I really wish I could give this a better review… the shirt is cute, however, the black is not distressed it is just black(all black). The thin pieces that are cut and hang in the back and on the sleeves, they are way too fragile(or poor material quality). One wash was all it took for one of the back ones to split in the center and on the right sleeve two split in half. My solution to wear it was to cut those off. But it is not the same anymore :( and the black faded the very slightest at the seems, but not enough to look distressed at all. Cute idea, poor execution and poor quality.

Sizing was spot on. I’m 5’ 9” and 140 # and the large fits perfectly. I love the way it hangs and it does look a lot like the picture as for fit. This wasn’t made in China (thank goodness) so I’d choose your regular size if you are on the fence. The color is okay for olive drab, but the fabric isn’t the greatest. It’s thin, really itchy and kind of “spotty” meaning that it looks faded in some areas and not in others, not happy about that. I’m hoping that after it’s washed and drowned in fabric softener, it’ll feel better on my skin. I’m overly finicky about the feel of any fabric so it may not affect anyone else. All in all, for the price and how different and cute it is, I’m happy with it. I love wearing something that you don’t see everywhere and on everyone. May get another in black.
